description.title: Event relevancy - 4 accounts own gateway, 4 accounts subscribe, 1 life-cycle event, 4 received
description.purpose: We have 4 accounts registered and connected to the network through their own gateways. All accounts subscribe to all events from the relevancy contract. Account4 transacts resulting in a NonIndexedAddressAndNumber event being emitted. As this is a life-cycle event, and each account has subscribed for all events through their own gateway, all subscriptions should receive the event.
